name: Architects EP
description:
A mixtape of artistic works developed by your friends at braingale. You will find four (6) videogames, two (2) albums, one (1) music videos that were created between the months of January and March, 2014.

F E A T U R I N G

  • 01. MOODY by Andrew Brophy + Sun Stains
  • 02. A2 by Barch
  • 03. INHERITING THE BEAST by Alec Stamos
  • 04. ⇡ by Andrew FM
  • 05. MONUMENT by mushbuh
  • 06. MARBLE SAFARI by Todd Luke
  • 07. SUPERSTRUCTURE by Sean Hogan
  • 08. TRAINIMATION by Josh Bradbury + Jmickle
  • 09. PESTPER [NTSC-U].ISO by POSTPRE
